tool_description: Generates a consolidated shopping list from a meal plan, organizing ingredients by store category and eliminating duplicates.

meal_schedule_id.description: Schedule ID from Weekly Meal Scheduler

household_size.description: Number of people the meals will serve (1-12)

pantry_staples.description: List of ingredients already available at home

store_layout.description: Store organization preference: standard, alphabetical, or custom

include_quantities.description: Whether to include specific quantities and units

error_messages: Invalid schedule ID: Meal schedule not found or invalid.
Invalid household size: Must be between 1 and 12 people.
Invalid store layout: Must be 'standard', 'alphabetical', or 'custom'.
Missing recipe data: Some recipes in the schedule lack ingredient information.
Quantity calculation error: Unable to calculate proper quantities for some ingredients.
usage: Provide meal_schedule_id and household_size. Optionally specify pantry_staples to exclude, preferred store_layout, and whether to include_quantities.

total_items.description: Total number of items on the shopping list

estimated_total_cost.description: Estimated total cost in local currency
